      给一个物品写入一个技能，无需写入SkillDescription的skill项，只需填写name和level即可 writes skills to an item SkillDescription's skill field is not necessary,for it only check the name and level.

      • giveEffect

        public boolean giveEffect​(java.lang.String name,
                          org.bukkit.entity.Player p,
                          int time,
                          int level)
        给予玩家指定名字的效果 add a named and registered effect to a player
        参数:
        name - 效果名称 effect identifier
        p - 玩家 target player
        time - 时间
        level - 等级
        返回:
        成功返回true，效果不存在返回false true if succeed,false if effect not exist

        参数:

        p - 玩家 target player
        time - 时间
        level - 等级

      • writeSkills

        public void writeSkills​(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack item,
                        java.util.Set<SkillDescription> skills)
        给一个物品写入一个技能，无需写入SkillDescription的skill项，只需填写name和level即可 writes skills to an item SkillDescription's skill field is not necessary,for it only check the name and level.
        参数:
        item - 目标物品 target item
        skills - 技能集合 Set of skills

      • readSkill

        public java.util.Set<SkillDescription> readSkill​(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack item)
        读取一个物品的技能 get skills of an item
        参数:
        item - 要读取的物品 target item
        返回:
        技能描述对象集合，如果物品没有技能则为null Set of SkillDescription object contains the info,null if no skill is presented on this item

        参数:

      • applyCoolDown

        public long applyCoolDown​(org.bukkit.entity.Player p,
                          Skill skill,
                          int milliSecond)
        为玩家启用一个冷却，需要自行判断是否在冷却时间内。如果玩家在冷却时间内，不会重新设置冷却 set a cool down for a player,you should check the result every time the skill triggered. this would not refresh cool down if player is in cool down.
        参数:
        p - 目标玩家 target player
        skill - 冷却的技能 skill to cool down
        milliSecond - 冷却时间ms cool down time in milliseconds
        返回:
        如果玩家不在冷却时间内，返回0，如果玩家正在冷却中，返回剩余时间ms return 0 if target player is not in cool down,otherwise return time rest

      • isCoolDown

        public boolean isCoolDown​(org.bukkit.entity.Player p,
                          Skill skill)
        检测一个玩家是否在冷却时间内 check if a player is in cool down
        参数:
        p - 目标玩家 target player
        skill - 技能 target skill
        返回:
        玩家是否在冷却时间内 if a player is in cool down.

      • resetCoolDown

        public void resetCoolDown​(org.bukkit.entity.Player p,
                          Skill skill)
        重置一个技能的冷却 reset cool down of the skill
        参数:
        p - 玩家 target player
        skill - 技能 target skill

      • renewCoolDown

        public void renewCoolDown​(org.bukkit.entity.Player p,
                          Skill skill,
                          int milliSecond)
        更新冷却时间并覆盖旧冷却时间 renew the cool down and overwrite the old one
        参数:
        p - 目标玩家 target player
        skill - 技能 skill to renew.
        milliSecond - 冷却时间 new cool down time

      • randomPercent

        public boolean randomPercent​(double percent)
        按照百分比随机 random under percent
        参数:
        percent - 百分比，单位%，最高为100/percent,unit %,max is 100
        返回:
        随机值是否在给定百分比之内/true if random value within the percentage
